descriptionHtml:
Features :

- New Lands - New Lands and Villages inspired and set in the Witcher saga
- New Storyline - Massive and Complex Main quest and a lot of sidequests that will provide ~20h of new gameplay. It\'ll tell the story of Geralt\'s death and his return to the world of the living, also it\'ll link Geralt\'s story to the realm of TES games. ( changing the whole Skyrim main quests etc. )
- New Equpiment - Full witcher Equpiment and a lot of Equipment of other factions in the world of witcher
- New Spells - All witcher signs and other spells taken straight of A. Sapowski\'s saga
- New Dialogues and Characters - Fully voice acted characters and complex dialogs that will stay with you for a long time
- New Alchemy system - Alchemy system that\'ll allow you to create witcher potions and sword oils
- New Monsters


Development

Right now I\'m working on a story script, quests and maps.
I\'ll start working on this project really seriously when the TES Construction Set will come out.

If Anyone Want to help with develpoment of this mod just write me personal msg.


Current Content :

Right now I\'m Uploading only save with Geralt character.
It\'s still WIP, because of lack of face generator I can\'t really make his face 100% satisfying.
author: Randal20 aka WitcherUntoldStory
